org.gatein.api.portal
Interface SiteQuery<T extends Site>

All Superinterfaces:
Query<Site>
public interface SiteQuery<T extends Site>
extends Query<Site>

Enables performing more complex queries for sites.

Author:
Boleslaw Dawidowicz
